text:
Roots - Trotter - Highlights - Jurassic - Park

(Excerpt) Read more at: E! Online

Wake Up To Breaking News! SUBMIT

Tariq Trotter kicked off "Jurassic Week" on The Tonight Show in style.Before Universal Pictures' Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom hits theaters June 22, Jimmy Fallon turned it over to Trotter, a.k.a. Black Thought, and asked him to summarize the film franchise.Backed by The Roots, Trotter recapped the highlights from Jurassic Park (1993), The Lost World: Jurassic Park (1997), Jurassic Park III (2001) and Jurassic World (2015). "Let's start with the first film / I'll tell you what I know/ Hammond is the man, the man that bringing back dinos / He opens up a park, there ain't nobody to veto / The plan to resurrect them with the blood of mosquitos / There's raptors in the kitchen / But I don't wanna spoil it / Just know the lawyer gets eaten on a toilet / This couldn't happen twice, well, yep, I'm...
title: Before You See Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom, You Need to Watch This Rap Recap
